subject: Texas Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Martin Laird tied the course record with a nine-under-par 63, holding off Rory McIlroy to earn his first PGA win in more than two years, at the Texas Open in San Antonio.
snippet: Martin Laird tied the course record with a nine-under-par 63, holding off Rory McIlroy to earn his first PGA win in more than two years, at the Texas Open in San Antonio.
